metadata.title: Microsoft 365 Identity Access Administrator
metadata.subtitle: Master Identity and Access Management in Microsoft 365
metadata.description: Become an expert in Microsoft 365 identity and access management, mastering Azure AD, conditional access, governance, and security features.
prerequisites: Knowledge of networking and security fundamentals

overview.summary: Microsoft 365 Identity Access Administrator training prepares you for the SC-300 certification by mastering Azure Active Directory, conditional access policies, identity governance, and access management in Microsoft 365 environments.
objectives: Implement and manage Azure AD identities
Manage access to applications and resources
overview.targetAudience: IT administrators, security professionals, and identity specialists who manage Microsoft 365 identities and access in enterprise environments.

modules.title: Azure AD Identity Management
modules.description: Master Azure Active Directory identity management

sections.content:
Azure AD Fundamentals

Azure Active Directory is the foundation of Microsoft 365 identity management, providing secure authentication and authorization for all Microsoft services.

labs.title: Azure AD Identity Lab
labs.description: Configure and manage Azure AD identities

sections.content:
Modern Authentication

Modern authentication provides enhanced security through multi-factor authentication, passwordless options, and advanced authentication methods.

modules.title: Conditional Access and Access Management
modules.description: Master conditional access policies and access management

sections.content: Conditional Access provides granular control over how and when users can access applications and resources based on defined conditions and policies.

labs.title: Conditional Access Lab
labs.description: Design and implement conditional access policies

modules.title: Identity Governance and Compliance
modules.description: Implement identity governance and compliance solutions

sections.content:
Identity Governance

Identity governance ensures that users have appropriate access to resources while maintaining security and compliance requirements.

includes: Hands-on lab access with Microsoft 365 tenant

faq.question: Do I need an Azure AD Premium license?
faq.answer: Yes, many advanced features covered in this course require Azure AD Premium P1 or P2 licenses. We provide access to a demo tenant for labs.

faq.question: Is this course technical?
faq.answer: Yes, this is a highly technical course covering advanced identity and access management concepts. Prior IT administration experience is recommended.

faq.question: What Azure AD features are covered?
faq.answer: The course covers Azure AD Premium features including conditional access, identity governance, PIM, and advanced authentication methods.

faq.question: Will I learn about hybrid identity?
faq.answer: Yes, the course includes Azure AD Connect, directory synchronization, and hybrid identity scenarios with on-premises Active Directory.
